forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 43. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 57. North wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening descends upon Boston, the sky presents a serene canvas, mostly clear with the chill of autumn whispering through the air. With temperatures dipping gently to around 43 degrees, a northwest breeze plays softly over the city, gusting occasionally to remind us of the season’s change. It is an evening that beckons for a cozy wrap or perhaps a light jacket, with the crispness invigorating yet inviting.

Tomorrow promises a generous embrace of sunshine as the morning dawns bright. The day will unfold with clear skies and an inviting high of 57, but the north winds will maintain a fair chill, so layering will be wise for those venturing out. Whether one chooses to stroll through the vibrant streets, sip hot coffee while gazing at the tranquility of the Charles, or simply bask in the sunlight at the public gardens, each moment will offer a lovely reprieve from the pace of city life. As twilight approaches again, consider winding down with a leisurely visit to a local bookstore or café, where the warm ambiance can cradle you until the last light fades.
